creditline: Gift of the Artist, by exchange
description: people in a park in the city, from L: 2 men lying on a step, resting their heads on duffel bags; young man in glasses standing on step, writing in a book; police officer gesturing with his PR hand; walking light-haired man with a handkerchief over his mouth and nose; black woman with crossed arms
